paper_metadata.title: Analysis of diversified patterns and poverty alleviation effect of paired assistance in China

program_information.region: B Town, W County, Lu'an City of Anhui Province

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The empirical results show that paired assistance provided by social forces can significantly contribute to the poverty alleviation of poor households, promoting the poverty alleviation rate by 7.8%
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: to analyze the diversified patterns and poverty alleviation effect of paired assistance based on the PSM-DID model

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: to analyze the diversified patterns and poverty alleviation effect of paired assistance based on the PSM-DID model
evidence_citations.country_citation: 2031 registered poor households in B Town, W County, Lu'an City of Anhui Province in China
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: 2031 registered poor households in B Town, W County, Lu'an City of Anhui Province in China
